extendedInfo.description: Have you been reusing your passwords? Are you finding strong passwords difficult to memorize? Would you be interested in powerful yet easy-to-remember passwords?Clear Password Generator is for you! This application strings together three-to-five random common words into a memorable passphrase which you can then paste into those pesky sign-up pages.Why does a group of common words provide better security than a jumble of letters, numbers and symbols? Head on over to http://xkcd.com/936/ for a succinct explanation. Disclaimer: I am not affiliated with xkcd in any way

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Love this app. I use it to generate passwords all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User
